name: Alt+ Tab Switcher
description: This extension allows you to switch to previous tabs in the order in which they were last viewed.

swap1.description: Switch to the most recently opened tab, as long as at least 1 other tab is open.

swap2.description: Switch to the 2nd most recently opened tab, as long as at least 2 other tabs are open.

arrowRight.description: Scroll to the right through tabs in the order they appear in the window.

arrowLeft.description: Scroll to the left through tabs in the order they appear in the window.
